item.title: Bell, Derek
item.description: Derek Bell Brit Year Pos Car 1970 DNF Ferrari 512S 1971 DNF Porsche 917LH S 1972 8th Ferrari 365 GTB/4 GT 1973 DNF Mirage M6-Ford Cosworth 1974 4th Gulf GR7-Ford Cosworth 1975 1st Mirage GR8-Ford Cosworth 1976 5th Mirage GR8-Ford Cosworth 1977 DNF Renault Alpine A442 1978 DNF Renault Alpine A442A 1979 DNF Mirage M10-Ford Cosworth 1980 13th Porsche 924 Carrera GT 1981 1st Porsche 936 1982 1st Porsche 956 1983 2nd Porsche 956 1985 3rd Porsche 962C 1986 1st Porsche 962C 1987 1st Porsche 962C 1988 2nd Porsche 962C 1989 DNF Porsche 962C GTi 1990 4th Porsche 962C 1991 7th Porsche 962C 1992 12th Porsche 962C GTi 1993 10th Courage C30LM-Porsche 1994 6th Kremer K8 Spyder-Porsche 1995 3rd McLaren F1 GTR 1996 6th McLaren F1 GTR

item.title: About
item.description: Our website builds with Hugo static site generator and Mainroad theme. This demo allows you to see what Mainroad based website looks like before deciding to go with it. Just keep in mind that the current demo shows the basics, a small part of what the combination of Hugo and Mainroad can do. About Mainroad Mainroad is a responsive, simple, clean and content-focused Hugo theme based on the MH Magazine lite WordPress theme.
